description: Mobile techniques used by Android/Chuli.A, ATT&CK software S0304 v1.2
name: Android/Chuli.A (S0304)

techniques.comment: [Android/Chuli.A](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0304) used HTTP uploads to a URL as a command and control mechanism.(Citation: Kaspersky-WUC)
[Android/Chuli.A](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0304) used SMS to receive command and control messages.(Citation: Kaspersky-WUC)
[Android/Chuli.A](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0304) stole contact list data stored both on the the phone and the SIM card.(Citation: Kaspersky-WUC)
[Android/Chuli.A](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0304) gathered system information including phone number, OS version, phone model, and SDK version.(Citation: Kaspersky-WUC)
